nodes.text: Tristan Melthabi was a female doctor in the Rebel Alliance who worked at the medical facility at the Alliance's Echo Base on the planet Hoth. During the Galactic Empire's attack on Echo Base in 3 ABY, a cave-in at the corridor to the medical facility trapped Melthabi and three medtechs. However, the kitchen worker Chase Wilsorr was sent to rescue them, and gave the four directions to the GR-75 medium transport Bright Hope.
Tristan Melthabi appeared in the short story "A Good Kiss," written by C.B. Lee as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
